topic.title: Medications Section Entries Optional2 - conformance rules

section.p: The Medications Section contains a patient's current medications and pertinent medication history. At a minimum, the currently active medications are listed. An entire medication history is an option. The section can describe a patient's prescription and dispense history and information about intended drug monitoring.

ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:1098-7791, CONF:1098-10432, CONF:1098-32500 ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.1"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2014-06-09"
SHALL conform to Medications Section Entries Optional template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.1)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1098-15385)/@code="10160-0" History of medication use (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:1098-15386, CONF:1098-30824)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHOULD contain [0..*] entry such that it (CONF:1098-7795, CONF:1098-10076)
Conforms to Medication Activity2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.16:2014-06-09)
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire
SHALL conform to Medications Section Entries Optional template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.1)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:1098-15385)/@code="10160-0" History of medication use (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:1098-15386, CONF:1098-30824)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title (CONF:7793, R2.0=CONF:1098-7793)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:7794, R2.0=CONF:1098-7794)

If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHOULD contain [0..*] entry such that it (CONF:1098-7795, CONF:1098-10076)
Conforms to Medication Activity2 (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.16:2014-06-09)
If medication use is unknown, the appropriate nullFlavor MAY be present (see unknown information in Section 1)
MAY satisfy: This constraint is being overridden as it has been removed in v2 and should never fire

ol.li: SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:7791 ) such that it SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.2.1"
Consol Medications Section Entries Optional If medication use is unknown, the appropriate nullFlavor MAY be present (see unknown information in Section 1)
Consol Medications Section Entries Optional SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code/@code="10160-0" History of medication use (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:7792)
Consol Medications Section Entries Optional SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] title (CONF:7793, R2.0=CONF:1098-7793)
Consol Medications Section Entries Optional SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] text (CONF:7794, R2.0=CONF:1098-7794)

Consol Medications Section Entries Optional If section/@nullFlavor is not present, SHOULD contain [0..*] entry such that it (CONF:7795, CONF:7573) Conforms to Medication Activity (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.4.16)
